actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to provide penalties for assaults against the elderly that result in medical expenses paid by the United States.

summary.text: Senior Citizens' Protection Act - Makes it a Federal offense to assault an individual age 62 or older and cause medical damages to such individual of more than $100 paid under title XVIII of the Social Security Act by an instrumentality of the Government of the United States. Specifies a mandatory minimum 30 days' imprisonment for such offense.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to provide penalties for assaults against the elderly that result in medical expenses paid by the United States.
